Token.Abstract: Class for building an NSAttributedString from an HTML document.
Initializes and returns a new NSAttributedString object from the HTML contained in the given object and base URL.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data in HTML format from which to create the attributed string.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies how the document should be loaded. Contains values described in “Option keys for importing documents.”

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns an initialized object, or nil if the data can’t be decoded.

Token.Abstract: Creates the attributed string when called the first time.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSAttributedString representing the HTML document passed in the initializer.

Token.Abstract: This block is called before the element is written to the output attributed string
